name: 로스팅 리포트: 대학 교수 살인사건
description:
The game limits the character's movement, evidence collection, and movement range over a limited time.
The time required is adjusted according to each level of difficulty, which is directly related to the relaxation of the game.
In terms of easy difficulty, some clues are lifted in advance and the time required is reduced, making it relatively easy to clear.
Usually, clues are not lifted at the level of difficulty, and the time required slightly increased, leading to urgent play.
In terms of difficulty level, the time required has increased significantly, so the user has to configure the clear route in advance.
